verses.verse: And He <S%G4779>called<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4779>together,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> them <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1140>demons,<s%> and to <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G3554>diseases.<s%>
And He <S%G649>sent<s%> them out to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and to <S%G2390>perform<s%> <S%G2390>healing.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G142>"Take<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> for [your] <S%G3598>journey,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> a <S%G4464>staff,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> a <S%G4082>bag,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G694>money;<s%> and do not [even] <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>tunics<s%> <S%G303>apiece.<s%>
"And <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> you <S%G1525>enter,<s%> <S%G3306>stay<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> and <S%G1831>take<s%> your <S%G1831>leave<s%> from <S%G1564>there.<s%>

"And as for those who do not <S%G1209>receive<s%> you, as you <S%G1831>go<s%> out from that <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G660>shake<s%> <S%G660>off<s%> the <S%G2868>dust<s%> from your <S%G4228>feet<s%> as a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> them."

And <S%G1831>departing,<s%> they [began] <S%G1330>going<s%> <S%G1330>about<s%> <S%G2596>among<s%> the <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel,<s%> and <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3837>everywhere.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5068>tetrarch<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> that was <S%G1096>happening;<s%> and he was <S%G1280>greatly<s%> <S%G1280>perplexed,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> it was <S%G3004>said<s%> by <S%G5100>some<s%> that <S%G2491>John<s%> had <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%>

and by <S%G5100>some<s%> that <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> had <S%G5316>appeared,<s%> and by <S%G243>others,<s%> that <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> of <S%G744>old<s%> had <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>

And <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G1473>myself<s%> had <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G607>beheaded;<s%> but <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>things<s%>?" And he kept <S%G2212>trying<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> Him.

And when the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G5290>returned,<s%> they <S%G1334>gave<s%> an <S%G1334>account<s%> to Him of <S%G3745>all<s%> that they had <S%G4160>done.<s%> And <S%G3880>taking<s%> them with Him, He <S%G5298>withdrew<s%> by <S%G2398>Himself<s%> to a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G966>Bethsaida.<s%>

But the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G1097>aware<s%> of this and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him; and <S%G588>welcoming<s%> them, He [began] <S%G2980>speaking<s%> to them <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G2390>curing<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G2322>healing.<s%>

And the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G2827>decline,<s%> and the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G630>"Send<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G630>away,<s%> that they may <S%G4198>go<s%> into the <S%G2945>surrounding<s%> <S%G2968>villages<s%> and <S%G68>countryside<s%> and <S%G2647>find<s%> <S%G2647>lodging<s%> and <S%G2147>get<s%> <S%G1979>something<s%> to <S%G1979>eat;<s%> for <S%G5602>here<s%> we are in a <S%G2048>desolate<s%> <S%G5117>place.<s%>"

But He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You <S%G1325>give<s%> them [something] to <S%G2068>eat!<s%>" And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> "We have <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish,<s%> <S%G1487>unless<s%> <S%G3385><s%> <S%G3385>perhaps<s%> we <S%G4198>go<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1033>food<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>"

(For there were <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men.<s%>) And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "Have them <S%G2625>recline<s%> [to eat] in <S%G2828>groups<s%> of <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G4004>fifty<s%> <S%G303>each.<s%>"
And they <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3779>so,<s%> and had them <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G2625>recline.<s%>

And He <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish,<s%> and <S%G308>looking<s%> up to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> He <S%G2127>blessed<s%> them, and <S%G2622>broke<s%> [them,] and kept <S%G1325>giving<s%> [them] to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

And they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2068>ate<s%> and were <S%G5526>satisfied;<s%> and the <S%G2801>broken<s%> <S%G2801>pieces<s%> which they had <S%G4052>left<s%> <S%G4052>over<s%> were <S%G142>picked<s%> up, <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> [full.]

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G1722>while<s%> He was <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were with Him, and He <S%G1905>questioned<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> do the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%>?"

And they <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2491>"John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist,<s%> and <S%G243>others<s%> [say] <S%G2243>Elijah;<s%> but <S%G243>others,<s%> that <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> of <S%G744>old<s%> has <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "But <S%G5101>who<s%> do you <S%G3004>say<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%>?" And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The <S%G5547>Christ<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
But He <S%G2008>warned<s%> them, and <S%G3853>instructed<s%> [them] not to <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> to <S%G3367>anyone,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things,<s%> and be <S%G593>rejected<s%> by the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> and be <S%G615>killed,<s%> and be <S%G1453>raised<s%> up on the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>"

And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to [them] <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> Me, let him <S%G720>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> up his <S%G4716>cross<s%> <S%G2596>daily,<s%> <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G190>follow<s%> Me.

"For <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2309>wishes<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> it, but <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G622>loses<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> for My <S%G1752>sake,<s%> he is the one who will <S%G4982>save<s%> it.

"For <S%G5101>what<s%> is a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5623>profited<s%> if he <S%G2770>gains<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G622>loses<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2210>forfeits<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>?

"For <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> is <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of Me and My <S%G3056>words,<s%> of him will the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> be <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> He <S%G2064>comes<s%> in His <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and [the glory] of the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and of the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G32>angels.<s%>

"But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you <S%G230>truthfully,<s%> there are <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G847>here<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> shall not <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> they <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

And <S%G5616>some<s%> <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>sayings,<s%> it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that He <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G3880>along<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> and <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G305>went<s%> up to the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> to <S%G4336>pray.<s%>

And <S%G1722>while<s%> He was <S%G4336>praying,<s%> the <S%G1491>appearance<s%> of His <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G2087>different,<s%> and His <S%G2441>clothing<s%> [became] <S%G3022>white<s%> [and] <S%G1823>gleaming.<s%>
And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> were <S%G4814>talking<s%> with Him; and they were <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and <S%G2243>Elijah,<s%>

<S%G3739>who,<s%> <S%G3708>appearing<s%> in <S%G1391>glory,<s%> were <S%G3004>speaking<s%> of His <S%G1841>departure<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G4137>accomplish<s%> at <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and his <S%G3588>companions<s%> <S%G4862><s%> had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G916>overcome<s%> with <S%G5258>sleep;<s%> but when they were <S%G1235>fully<s%> <S%G1235>awake,<s%> they <S%G3708>saw<s%> His <S%G1391>glory<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G4921>standing<s%> with Him.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about, as <S%G846>these<s%> were <S%G1316>parting<s%> from Him, <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1988>"Master,<s%> it is <S%G2570>good<s%> for us to be <S%G5602>here;<s%> and let us <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4633>tabernacles:<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> for You, and <S%G1520>one<s%> for <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> for <S%G2243>Elijah<s%>" â€“ not <S%G3609>realizing<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he was <S%G3004>saying.<s%>

And while he was <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G1096>formed<s%> and [began] to <S%G1982>overshadow<s%> them; and they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> as they <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud.<s%>
And a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> out of the <S%G3507>cloud,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is My <S%G5207>Son,<s%> [My] <S%G1586>Chosen<s%> One; <S%G191>listen<s%> to Him!"

And <S%G1722>when<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> had <S%G1096>spoken,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%> And they <S%G4601>kept<s%> <S%G4601>silent,<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> to <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3762>any<s%> of the things <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G3708>seen.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about on the <S%G1836>next<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> that when they had <S%G2718>come<s%> <S%G2718>down<s%> from the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> Him.

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> from the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G994>shouted<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> I <S%G1189>beg<s%> You to <S%G1914>look<s%> at my <S%G5207>son,<s%> for he is my <S%G3439>only<s%> [boy,]

and <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2983>seizes<s%> him, and he <S%G1810>suddenly<s%> <S%G2896>screams,<s%> and it <S%G4682>throws<s%> him into a <S%G4682>convulsion<s%> with <S%G876>foaming<s%> [at the mouth,] and as it <S%G4937>mauls<s%> him, it <S%G3433>scarcely<s%> <S%G672>leaves<s%> him.
"And I <S%G1189>begged<s%> Your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> it out, and they <S%G1410>could<s%> not."

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5599>"O<s%> <S%G571>unbelieving<s%> and <S%G1294>perverted<s%> <S%G1074>generation,<s%> <S%G2193>how<s%> <S%G2193>long<s%> <S%G4219><s%> shall I be with you, and <S%G430>put<s%> up with you? <S%G4317>Bring<s%> your <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G5602>here.<s%>"

And while he was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G4334>approaching,<s%> the <S%G1140>demon<s%> <S%G4486>dashed<s%> him [to the ground,] and <S%G4952>threw<s%> him into a <S%G4952>convulsion.<s%> But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G2390>healed<s%> the <S%G3816>boy,<s%> and <S%G591>gave<s%> him <S%G591>back<s%> to his <S%G3962>father.<s%>

And they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1605>amazed<s%> at the <S%G3168>greatness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> But while <S%G3956>everyone<s%> was <S%G2296>marveling<s%> at <S%G3956>all<s%> that He was <S%G4160>doing,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

" Let <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G5087>sink<s%> into your <S%G3775>ears;<s%> for the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G3195>going<s%> to be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> into the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>"

But they did not <S%G50>understand<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4487>statement,<s%> and it was <S%G3871>concealed<s%> from them <S%G2443>so<s%> that they might not <S%G143>perceive<s%> it; and they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to <S%G2065>ask<s%> Him <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4487>statement.<s%>
And an <S%G1261>argument<s%> <S%G1525>arose<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them as to <S%G5101>which<s%> of them might be the <S%G3173>greatest.<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> <S%G1261>what<s%> they were <S%G1261>thinking<s%> in their <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> a <S%G3813>child<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> him by His <S%G3844>side,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3739>"Whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> in My <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> Me; and <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> Me <S%G1209>receives<s%> Him who <S%G649>sent<s%> Me; for he who is <S%G3398>least<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, <S%G3778>this<s%> is the one who is <S%G3173>great.<s%>"

And <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1988>"Master,<s%> we <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G1544>casting<s%> out <S%G1140>demons<s%> in Your <S%G3686>name;<s%> and we tried to <S%G2967>hinder<s%> him <S%G3754>because<s%> he does not <S%G190>follow<s%> along with us."
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "Do not <S%G2967>hinder<s%> [him;] for he <S%G3739>who<s%> is not <S%G2596>against<s%> you is for you."
